description: Understand the basics of the Linux operating system and how to manage it.
Learn how to containerize applications using Docker and manage containers.
Gain expertise in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform.
Understand the principles of CI/CD and implement pipelines.
Explore orchestration with Kubernetes and how to deploy clusters.
Understand the basics of machine learning and its applications.
Learn techniques for preparing and cleaning data for machine learning models.
Explore and implement supervised learning algorithms such as regression and classification.
Understand and apply unsupervised learning methods like clustering and dimensionality reduction.
Delve into neural networks, deep learning architectures, and their applications.
Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity and its importance in protecting information.
Learn the basics of securing computer networks, including firewalls and intrusion detection systems.
Explore common cyber threats and techniques for vulnerability assessment.
Develop skills in responding to cybersecurity incidents and conducting digital forensics.
Understand security considerations in cloud environments and best practices.
Understand the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Learn server-side development using Node.js and Nest framework.
id: Backend Development with Node.js and Nest

description: Explore database concepts and learn to design and manage databases for web applications.
Master client-side development using Angular framework for building dynamic user interfaces.
Develop and integrate RESTful APIs for communication between frontend and backend.
